file_content.text: You're still alive. Son of a Hutt. How you been, Major?
Corporal Tanno Vik. Your uniform's a disgrace.
You're still an embarrassment.
You could've just knocked. My men spent hours on that barricade.
I could ask you the same question, Vik. Never thought I'd see your ugly mug again.
Tanno Vik, what a surprise....
After five years of mandatory R&R--what do you think?
I've been worse.
They should've done a better job.
Not my problem.
I like to make an entrance.
Knocking isn't my style.
I'll remember that on my next visit.
Duly noted.
Haha!
Identification: That snort issued from the brilliant engineer we were sent to rescue, master.
What's she to you?
Don't make this difficult.
Shut up. Give me what I want.
None of your business. Let her go and there won't be trouble.
That's irrelevant.
An indispensable engineer. I don't want to cause trouble, Vik. We used to be a team.
She's the reason I'm here. This doesn't have to get messy. Let her go and I'll be on my way.
Don't question your commanding officer. Release the hostage and fall in line.
You're not in a position to ask questions. Hand over the hostage. Now.
Listen to you, acting like I'm still in Havoc Squad. That pack of bucketheads couldn't wait to throw me out.
I can't imagine why.
Point is, I'm not taking orders.
You eliminated my old rival Oggo. That inclines me toward gratitude, but this girl tried to rob me. That's bad for business.
Charging fifty-thousand credits for a hundred thermal detonators? That's robbery!
Well aren't you something.
That was a long time ago. I'm not in Havoc Squad anymore.
What happened to the others? Jorgan and Elara?
Don't know. Don't care.
You also insulted my mother.
I said she's uglier than a bantha wearing lipstick. It's not an insult if it's true.
My mother died putting me on a refugee ship to Nar Shaddaa. I grew up an orphan.
Oh, boo-who didn't? Join the club.
You see why I have to kill her.
I recognize that insignia on your armor. Republic Special Forces. Havoc Squad.
Aren't you Havoc Squad?
You never talked about your mother to me once.
Your mother?
Len was right about her.... "big personality".
Wow. She's annoying.
Do you have a holo of your mother? That should settle the argument.
Hang on, she may be right.
Len can shove it.
And you never made the mistake of insulting her.
Haven't run with that outfit for a long time. I'd paint over the symbol but it still comes in handy even out here.
And I know who you are, too. Everyone said you were dead, but I knew better.
You've got a pretty big personality yourself. Yeah, I know who you are. Everyone said you were dead, but I knew better.
Watch it. I'm only playing nice because of who you are. Everyone said you were dead, but I knew better.
What do you say we show each other professional courtesy? I can get you all kinds of things. But I need to throw this thieving scum out an airlock, first.
Don't push your luck, Major.
Theory: It will be a challenge to throw anything without your arms.
I never liked you, Vik. Dismissed.
I don't like your attitude.
No deal. [Kill Tanno Vik]
You're both being ridiculous. We can resolve this disagreement without a fight.
Settle this peacefully, folks.
Where have you been all my life?
Shooting things.
Stabbing things.
Koth and the others are waiting at the docks.
You're why the Captain risked his neck on Zakuul. We are gonna get along great. I'll grab Mister Ugly Dead Guy's thermal detonators. Catch you later.
Let her go and apologize for threatening her. Tora, you apologize for trying to steal his merchandise. Pay him what he wants.
I ain't sorry for nothing!
Fine! Sorry I insulted your mother....
What? I didn't catch that!
I'm sorry! Your mother was a nice lady. Okay?
Wrong. She was the best. Now give me my credits.
Done. Where's my apology?
Shipment's on its way. Sorry we almost stopped doing business. See you folks around....
I've never apologized to anyone in my life.
Then just say "thank you" and get to the docks. Koth and the others are waiting.
A little gratitude, please.
Keep talking and I'll offer your life as payment for the next shipment.
I can still get rid of you.
Are you all right? Did they hurt you?
I'm just glad you're safe.
And they say I'm a piece of work.
Just get to the docks. Koth and the others are waiting.
He ain't gonna be happy you spent all our credits.
Thank you.
You won't turn a profit by killing your customers. Let her go.
This isn't even practical.
You always were a stick in the mud.
A man like me can't afford to look weak.
Do the right thing, Vik. For once in your life.
Fine. But this is the last order I take from you, Major.
Keep your filthy hands off me!
Alright, boys. Let's go show the Zone who's in charge.
What a waste of time.
You were almost dead. A "thank you" would be nice.
Be grateful you're alive.
It could've been a lot worse. I'm just glad you're all right.
At least you're safe.
Shut your mouth and get to the docks. Koth is waiting.
Don't test me.
I had him right where I wanted him.
Roger, sir! On the double, sir!
Oh, so scary.
So would a hundred thermal detonators. Life's full of disappointments.
What do you care? You're the Free Zone's new boss.
Fine--take the yapping monkey-lizard. But she's lost her shopping privileges.
Redirection: We should proceed to the rendezvous with Senya, master.
Koth and the rest of your crew are waiting at the docks.
Yeah, yeah....
My pride got busted, but that's your fault.
If you're feeling up to it, Koth needs you at the docks.
Nobody has to kill anybody. I'm sure we can settle this peacefully.
We can work this out.
Look--I know who you are. I know you're used to getting your own way.
I'll get you the money for your detonators. But Tora is leaving with me. Alive.
We pay, Tora leaves. Period.
Mercy and profit don't mix.
